nodes.text: The Renegade was a Naboo-based militia of Humans and Gungans under the leadership of the minor Dark Jedi, Savor Kibbs, around the time of the Battle of Naboo. Kibbs, a charismatic person and a master of Affect Mind held his group together by influencing their minds with the Force. Their goal was to ultimately take control of Naboo, but they were stopped by members of the disbanded Naboo Underground movement, who defeated Kibbs and liberated the minds of his underlings.
